hu_HU {
    AddressFormat { 
        PostalFormat { "%f%N%a%N%d%N%b%N%s %h %e %r%N%%z %T%N%c%N" }
    }
    ///* Discarding duplicate data for tag: AmPmMarkers */
    ///* Discarding duplicate data for tag: CountryISBNNumber */
    ///* Discarding duplicate data for tag: CountryNumber */
    CurrencyElements { 
            "Ft",
            "HUF ",
            ",",
    }
    Identification { 
        Title { "Hungarian locale for Hungary" }
        Source { "RAP" }
        Address { "Sankt Jorgens Alle 8, DK-1615 Kobenhavn V, Danmark" }
        Contact { "" }
        Email { "bug-glibc@gnu.org" }
        Telephone { "" }
        Fax { "" }
        Language { "Hungarian" }
        Territory { "Hungary" }
        Audience { "" }
        Application { "" }
        Abbreviation { "" }
        Revision { "4.7" }
        Date { "2001-01-29" }
    }
    ///* Discarding duplicate data for tag: LanguageLibraryUse */
    Measurement { "Metric" }
    Messages { 
        YesExpression { "^[IiYy].*" }
        NoExpression { "^[nN].*" }
        YesStr { "" }
        NoStr { "" }
    }
    NameFormat { 
        NamePattern { "%d%t%g%t%m%t%f" }
        GeneralSalutaion { "" }
        ShortSalutationMr { "" }
        ShortSalutationMiss { "" }
        ShortSalutationMrs { "" }
        LongSalutationMr { "" }
        LongSalutationMiss { "" }
        LongSalutationMrs { "" }
    }
    NumberElements { 
            ",",
            ".",
            ";",
            "%",
            "0",
            "#",
            "-",
            "E",
            "\u2030",
            "\u221E",
            "\uFFFD",
    }
    NumberPatterns { 
            "#,##0.###;-#,##0.###",
            "#,##0.00 \u00A4;-#,##0.00 \u00A4",
            "#,##0%",
    }
    TelephoneFormat { 
        InternationalFormat { "+%c %a %l" }
        DomesticFormat { "" }
        InternationalDialCode { "" }
        InternationalPrefix { "36" }
    }
    calendar{
        gregorian{
            DateTimePatterns{
                    "HH.mm.ss",
                    "HH.mm.ss",
                    "HH.mm.ss",
                    "HH.mm.ss",
                    "yyyy. MMM. dd., EEEE,  z",
                    "yyyy. MMM. dd., EEEE, HH.mm.ss z",
                    "yyyy-MMMM-dd",
                    "yyyy-MMMM-dd",
                    "{1} {0}",
            }
            dayNames{
                format{
                    abbreviated{
                            "v",
                            "h",
                            "k",
                            "sze",
                            "cs",
                            "p",
                            "szo",
                    }
                    wide{
                            "vas\u00E1rnap",
                            "h\u00E9tf\u0151",
                            "kedd",
                            "szerda",
                            "cs\u00FCt\u00F6rt\u00F6k",
                            "p\u00E9ntek",
                            "szombat",
                    }
                }
            }
            monthNames{
                format{
                    abbreviated{
                            "jan",
                            "feb",
                            "m\u00E1r",
                            "\u00E1pr",
                            "m\u00E1j",
                            "j\u00FAn",
                            "j\u00FAl",
                            "aug",
                            "sze",
                            "okt",
                            "nov",
                            "dec",
                            "",
                    }
                    wide{
                            "janu\u00E1r",
                            "febru\u00E1r",
                            "m\u00E1rcius",
                            "\u00E1prilis",
                            "m\u00E1jus",
                            "j\u00FAnius",
                            "j\u00FAlius",
                            "augusztus",
                            "szeptember",
                            "okt\u00F3ber",
                            "november",
                            "december",
                            "",
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
